title: Enhancing Learning Design Practical Competencies: PBL (Problem-Based Learning) Simulation Workshop for Agricultural Science

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Agricultural Science Knowledge and Professional Practical Experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze real-world agricultural science problems and derive solutions
Learners can execute problem-definition-to-solution processes through asynchronous collaboration with over 80% accuracy
Learners can solve complex agricultural problems—such as crop pest management and sustainable resource utilization—in simulation environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
